author: Chris Riotta, Chris Riotta
title: Ivanka Trump travels to family golf club for Passover after urging Americans to 'do your part' and stay at home
description: First daughter repeatedly encourages others to stay home while visiting the Trump National Golf Club in New Jersey
content:
Despite urging Americans to follow social distancing measures and avoid discretionary travel, Ivanka Trump reportedly embarked on a trip to her family's golf club in New Jersey for the Passover holiday amid the coronavirus pandemic.
The first daughter, who a… [+2398 chars]
